name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering robust applications across healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and orchestrating containerized applications using **Kubernetes**. Expertise in developing microservices and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines to ensure quality and efficiency. Strong command of **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **Python**, complemented by experience with databases like **MySQL**. Adept in cross-team collaboration and technical leadership, with a history of mentoring team members to enhance their skills. Well-versed in compliance-driven development to meet stringent industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django** for predictive analytics and real-time processing.
